Metadata.title: Dastan Abikov
Metadata.description: Entrepreneur, investor, speaker, activist, and diplomat. Dastan Abikov was born in 1999 in Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic.

interviewYoutube.title: Interview with Dastan Abikov
interviewYoutube.description: Dastan Abikov talks about his life, business, and future plans

neoplaceArticle.title: Neoplace: Discovering the Ultimate Nomadic Lifestyle
neoplaceArticle.description: Neoplace revolutionizes the modern-day nomadic lifestyle with innovative solutions.

sputnikArticle.title: The 17-Year-Old Entrepreneur Who Earned $500 a Day
sputnikArticle.description: The businessman was interviewed by Sputnik Kyrgyzstan correspondent Asel Minbaeva.

Biography.subtitle: Biography
Biography.title: WAS BORN IN 1999 IN KYRGYZ REPUBLIC

shortFacts.0: At the age of 15, he started engaging in entrepreneurship
shortFacts.1: At the age of 21, he earned his first million dollars
shortFacts.2: At the age of 23, he developed a socio-economic development program for the Kyrgyz Republic
shortFacts.3: At the age of 24, he spoke at a commission meeting at the United Nations (UN)
shortFacts.4: He received an education at the Kyrgyz Economic University and Harvard Business School

0.description: • Dastan Abikov was born in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan

2.description:
• Founded a successful contracting company in the construction industry.
  • Was recognized by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology as one of the most promising young entrepreneurs
  • Received support from the Prime Minister of the Kyrgyz Republic

3.description: • Graduated from Tursun Temirova School in Kochkor District, Naryn Region

4.description:
• Earned his first million dollars
  • Started sponsoring the Kyrgyzstan Jiu-Jitsu Sports Federation
  • Started sponsoring the cultural project Ilgeri

5.description:
• Completed a professional education program at Harvard Business School (HBS)
  • Became a member of the Harvard Business School community
  • Developed a socio-economic development program for the Kyrgyz Republic

6.description:
• Graduated from the economic program at the Kyrgyz Economic University (KEU)
  • Founded the Kyrgyz Fund. Scholarship programs operate under the fund's aegis

7.description:
• Founded the 'Sustainable Mountain Development Fund' (SMDF) in New York
  • Became a member of the Mountain Partnership at the United Nations (UN)
  • Spoke at a commission meeting at the United Nations (UN)

KyrgyzFund.title: Kyrgyz Fund
KyrgyzFund.description: Our fund is aimed at developing human potential. We believe that a successful generation will create a strong economy and a prosperous country. Apply for the scholarship program
